ModMetaData.name: No Hemogen Farm Medical Alert
ModMetaData.author: DarkFlame7
ModMetaData.description:
Patches the "Medical Emergency" alert to ignore extreme blood loss on prisoners that are set to the "Hemogen Farm" interaction mode.
Hemogen Farm prisoners are always suffering from blood loss, and so the alert barely ever goes away in vanilla if you have more than a couple.
Other life-threatening health conditions still trigger the alert.
